name: Gluten-Free Blueberry Crisp
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This is a fast-to-fix dessert and is suitable for those who are following a gluten-free diet. Feel free to swap around the fruit flavor and cake mix flavors. For instance, cherry and yellow cake mix with pecans.
ingredients: 8 ¼ ounces gluten-free yellow cake mix
½ cup gluten-free oats (such as Bob's Red Mill®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Pour blueberry filling in a 9x9-inch baking dish and smooth to even out in the dish
Sprinkle dry cake mix over the filling, smoothing evenly to cover the top
Pour melted butter over the top, covering evenly
Mix sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl; sprinkle evenly on top
Bake in the preheated oven until filling is bubbly and top is brown, 40 to 50 minutes
